alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Whiteside (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 06 at 10:36AM CDT until further notice by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois...Iowa...Missouri... Mississippi River at Keokuk LD19, Gregory Landing, Keithsburg, New Boston LD17, Muscatine, Ill. City LD16, Rock Island LD15, Le Claire LD14, Fulton LD13, Bellevue LD12, Camanche, Burlington, Gladstone LD18, Dubuque LD11, and Dubuque. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Fulton LD13. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Water seeps into a few back yards in Savanna. Water seeps into yards on Peal and Broad Streets in Sabula. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 19.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 16.1 feet next Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/quadcities. The next statement will be issued this evening.
